Package com.jme.post.filters

Class CartoonEdgeFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme.post.Filter
      • com.jme.post.filters.CartoonEdgeFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme.export.Savable
    public class CartoonEdgeFilter
extends com.jme.post.Filter
    Applies a cartoon-style edge detection filter to all objects in the scene.
    Author:
    Kirill Vainer
